<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- AMDGPUImageIntrinsicOptimizer.cpp ----------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass tries to combine multiple image&#95;load intrinsics with dim=2dmsaa</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or dim=2darraymsaa into a single image&#95;msaa&#95;load intrinsic if:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - they refer to the same vaddr except for sample&#95;id,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - they use a constant sample&#95;id and they fall into the same group,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - they have the same dmask and the number of intrinsics and the number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   vaddr/vdata dword transfers is reduced by the combine.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Examples for the tradeoff (all are assuming 2DMsaa for vaddr):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +----------+-----+-----+-------+---------+------------+---------+----------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// | popcount | a16 | d16 | #load | vaddr / | #msaa&#95;load | vaddr / | combine? |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |  (dmask) |     |     |       | vdata   |            | vdata   |          |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +----------+-----+-----+-------+---------+------------+---------+----------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |        1 |   0 |   0 |     4 |  12 / 4 |          1 |   3 / 4 | yes      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +----------+-----+-----+-------+---------+------------+---------+----------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |        1 |   0 |   0 |     2 |   6 / 2 |          1 |   3 / 4 | yes?     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +----------+-----+-----+-------+---------+------------+---------+----------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |        2 |   0 |   0 |     4 |  12 / 8 |          2 |   6 / 8 | yes      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +----------+-----+-----+-------+---------+------------+---------+----------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |        2 |   0 |   0 |     2 |   6 / 4 |          2 |   6 / 8 | no       |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +----------+-----+-----+-------+---------+------------+---------+----------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |        1 |   0 |   1 |     2 |   6 / 2 |          1 |   3 / 2 | yes      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +----------+-----+-----+-------+---------+------------+---------+----------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some cases are of questionable benefit, like the one marked with &quot;yes?&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// above: fewer intrinsics and fewer vaddr and fewer total transfers between SP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and TX, but higher vdata. We start by erring on the side of converting these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to MSAA&#95;LOAD.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clang-format off</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass will combine intrinsics such as (not neccessarily consecutive):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  call float @llvm.amdgcn.image.load.2dmsaa.f32.i32(i32 1, i32 %s, i32 %t, i32 0, &lt;8 x i32&gt; %rsrc, i32 0, i32 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  call float @llvm.amdgcn.image.load.2dmsaa.f32.i32(i32 1, i32 %s, i32 %t, i32 1, &lt;8 x i32&gt; %rsrc, i32 0, i32 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  call float @llvm.amdgcn.image.load.2dmsaa.f32.i32(i32 1, i32 %s, i32 %t, i32 2, &lt;8 x i32&gt; %rsrc, i32 0, i32 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  call float @llvm.amdgcn.image.load.2dmsaa.f32.i32(i32 1, i32 %s, i32 %t, i32 3, &lt;8 x i32&gt; %rsrc, i32 0, i32 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ==&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  call &lt;4 x float&gt; @llvm.amdgcn.image.msaa.load.2dmsaa.v4f32.i32(i32 1, i32 %s, i32 %t, i32 0, &lt;8 x i32&gt; %rsrc, i32 0, i32 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clang-format on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Future improvements:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - We may occasionally not want to do the combine if it increases the maximum</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   register pressure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Ensure clausing when multiple MSAA&#95;LOAD are generated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: Even though the image&#95;msaa&#95;load intrinsic already exists on gfx10, this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// combine only applies to gfx11, due to a limitation in gfx10: the gfx10</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IMAGE&#95;MSAA&#95;LOAD only works correctly with single-channel texture formats, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we don&#39;t know the format at compile time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpu-h">AMDGPU.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
